about_the_game:
___________The game story___________
Among the innumerable Isekai worlds in [Isekai team], some Isekai worlds are regarded as "abnormal" by the ancient gods because of the appearance of "demon king". The ancient gods will use the power of erosion to destroy the Isekai world to prevent the "abnormal" from spreading to other worlds. However, the residents of the destroyed Isekai world are obviously innocent. As the hero of the Isekai team, under the guidance of the divine emissary, you will solve the "abnormal" crisis of different worlds and prevent them from being destroyed. And in the constant journey to the Isekai world, things seem to be moving in an unpredictable direction...

___________The game features___________
* Fight in real time, grow stronger and challenge more and more powerful enemies as you travel across isekai worlds.
* Random levels, spacious scenes, dealing with enemies and events in different scenes, and the possibility of bad weather at any time.
* Random weapon types and weapon enchant, get the weapon you think is appropriate to defeat the enemy, in the isekai world to search for more powerful weapons.
* No need to unlock unique characters that can be freely played. Each character has a different talent and fighting style, and is able to wake up their own weapons by disintegrating the weapon fragments they acquire.
* Provide support for permanent growth, each adventure earned by the divine gold allows you to strengthen yourself, stronger.
* Adjustable strategy difficulty. The yggdrasil system in the divine world adjusts the difficulty of your Isekai world journey through the buffs and debuffs.

___________♦Update plan♦___________
* 1. Magic combination gameplay, making the attack modes of spell weapons more diverse (completed √)
* 2. Character gameplay optimization, boss behavior optimization (completed √)
* 3. Dedicated Weapon Awakening (completed √)
* 4. Time Temple open (completed √)
* 5. Permanent growth system (completed √)
* 6. The game encyclopedia function (completed √)
* 7. Rune Workshop and Rune Collection gameplay (completed √)
* 8. Novice guide (completed √)
* 9. Complete the development of story mode and experience the complete main plot. (completed √)
* 10. Hard mode gameplay (completed √)
